name: New Person
script:
-------------------------------------------------
--         Put your Lua functions here.        --
--                                             --
-- Note that you can also use external Scripts --
-------------------------------------------------
function ak.playercheck(who)
	ak[who] = ak[who] or ak.newplayer()
end

function ak.newplayer()
	return { 
		defs = {
		},
		bals = {
			["salve"] = true,
		},
		affs = {
			["addiction"]      = 0,
			["aeon"]           = 0,
			["agoraphobia"]    = 0,
